description:
Over 1,200 people like you have already taken this course. Why? Because it's easy to understand.

You may be asking yourself: What is the easiest way to learn Excel? Where do I begin? How do I build a spreadsheet? What is the best way to enter data in Excel? Are there any shortcuts? Which formulas and functions do I need to know? What is Excel VLOOKUP? What is Excel table array? How do I use the IF function? What the heck are AND, OR functions?

If these questions sound familiar, this course is for you. It begins as a basic Excel tutorial and quickly takes you to the next level of Excel knowledge and expertise.

What will happen during this course?

1. You will watch high-quality instruction videos that are clear and to the point.

2. You will practice what I teach you using the sample files that I provide.

3. You will learn tricks and shortcuts that will save you time.

4. You will discover that Excel can actually be fun!

What will happen after you take this course?

1. You will realize that you are much more comfortable with Excel.

2. Projects that once took days will now only take hours.

3. Your colleagues and your boss may be surprised!

This Excel course is one of the Easy Excel With Igor series. Igor's other high quality Excel tutorials include: "Data Manipulation In Excel" which shows you how to save up to 90% of time when using Excel for certain data management tasks; "Excel Conditional Formatting Master Class" where you can learn how to improve your spreadsheets using conditional formatting in Excel; "Excel Pivot Tables Data Analysis Master Class" that takes you step by step to mastering data-crunching skills in Pivot Tables; â€œMicrosoft Excel Charts Master Class" that builds your skills in creating Excel charts and graphs.
title: Master Excel Spreadsheets With Ease
